languages.text: Осознав решение Вольного Торговца, в приступе ярости Маражай исчезает во мраке корабельного нутра. Спустя несколько минут из тьмы доносятся истошные вопли несчастного, попавшегося под руку взбешенного ксеноса — крики, которые еще долго эхо гуляют под сводами судна.

traits.locale_text: Осознав решение Вольного Торговца, в приступе ярости Маражай хватает ближайшего матроса. Медленно, наслаждаясь каждым моментом, он вдавливает глаза несчастного глубже в череп, впитывая боль и крики словно нектар, способный заглушить его собственные чувства.

languages.text: Having learned of the Rogue Trader's decision, Marazhai disappears in a fit of rage into the darkness of the ship's bowels. After several minutes, heart-rending screams can be heard from the gloom, belonging to the unfortunate soul who fell into the irate xenos's hands — screams which echo for a long time under the arches of the ship.
languages.original_text: Осознав решение Вольного Торговца, в приступе ярости Маражай исчезает во мраке корабельного нутра. Спустя несколько минут из тьмы доносятся истошные вопли несчастного, попавшегося под руку взбешенного ксеноса — крики, которые еще долго эхо гуляют под сводами судна.

traits.locale_text: Having learned of the Rogue Trader's decision, Marazhai disappears in a fit of rage into the darkness of the ship's bowels. After several minutes, heart-rending screams can be heard from the gloom, belonging to the unfortunate soul who fell into the irate xeno's hands — screams which echo for a long time under the arches of the ship.

After several minutes, heart-rending screams can be heard from the gloom, belonging to the unfortunate soul who fell into the irate xeno's hands — screams which echo for a long time under the arches of the ship.

After several minutes, heart-rending screams can be heard from the gloom, belonging to the unfortunate soul who fell into the irate xenos's hands — screams which echo for a long time under the arches of the ship.

Having learned of the Rogue Trader's decision, Marazhai disappears in a fit of rage into the darkness of the ship's bowels. After several minutes, heart-rending screams can be heard from the gloom, belonging to the unfortunate soul who fell into the irate xenos's hands — screams which echo for a long time under the arches of the ship.

Having learned of the Rogue Trader's decision, Marazhai disappears in a fit of rage into the darkness of the ship's bowels. After several minutes, heart-rending screams can be heard from the gloom, belonging to the unfortunate soul who fell into the irate xenos's hands — screams which echo for a long time under the arches of the ship.

languages.text: 得知行商浪人的决定后，玛拉斋满心狂怒，消失在了飞船深处的黑暗中。几分钟后，黑暗中传来了撕心裂肺的尖叫声。某个落入愤怒异形之手的不幸灵魂放声尖叫，惨叫声在舰船的拱门下回响了很久。
languages.original_text: Having learned of the Rogue Trader's decision, Marazhai disappears in a fit of rage into the darkness of the ship's bowels. After several minutes, heart-rending screams can be heard from the gloom, belonging to the unfortunate soul who fell into the irate xenos's hands — screams which echo for a long time under the arches of the ship.

traits.locale_text: 得知行商浪人的决定后，玛拉斋满心狂怒，消失在了飞船深处的黑暗中。几分钟后，黑暗中传来了撕心裂肺的尖叫声。某个落入愤怒异形之手的不幸灵魂放声尖叫，惨叫声在舰船的拱门下回响了很久。

languages.text: 自由開拓者の決断を知ったマラズハイは激怒し、船底の暗闇に消えていった。数分後、怒りに燃えた異種族の手に落ちた不幸な魂が発する、悲痛な叫び声が暗闇から聞こえてきた。その悲鳴は、船のアーチの下で長いこと響き渡った。
languages.original_text: Having learned of the Rogue Trader's decision, Marazhai disappears in a fit of rage into the darkness of the ship's bowels. After several minutes, heart-rending screams can be heard from the gloom, belonging to the unfortunate soul who fell into the irate xenos's hands — screams which echo for a long time under the arches of the ship.

traits.locale_text: 自由開拓者の決断を知ったマラズハイは激怒し、船底の暗闇に消えていった。数分後、怒りに燃えた異種族の手に落ちた不幸な魂が発する、悲痛な叫び声が暗闇から聞こえてきた。その悲鳴は、船のアーチの下で長いこと響き渡った。

languages.text: Al enterarse de la decisión {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente, Marazhai desaparece en un arrebato de ira en la oscuridad de las profundidades de la nave. Al cabo de varios minutos, se oyen gritos estremecedores procedentes de la oscuridad, pertenecientes a la desafortunada persona que ha caído en manos del iracundo xenos, gritos que resuenan durante mucho tiempo bajo las bóvedas de la nave.
languages.original_text: Having learned of the Rogue Trader's decision, Marazhai disappears in a fit of rage into the darkness of the ship's bowels. After several minutes, heart-rending screams can be heard from the gloom, belonging to the unfortunate soul who fell into the irate xenos's hands — screams which echo for a long time under the arches of the ship.

traits.locale_text: Al enterarse de la decisión {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente, Marazhai desaparece en un arrebato de ira en la oscuridad de las profundidades de la nave. Al cabo de varios minutos, se oyen gritos estremecedores procedentes de la oscuridad, pertenecientes a la desafortunada persona que ha caído en manos del iracundo xenos, gritos que resuenan durante mucho tiempo bajo las bóvedas de la nave.

languages.text: Nachdem Marazhai von der Entscheidung {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} erfährt, rauscht er zornig ab und verschwindet in der Dunkelheit des Schiffs. Nach mehreren Minuten sind aus der Düsternis herzzerreißende Schreie zu vernehmen, die Schreie der armen Seele, die dem zornigen Xenos in die Hände gefallen ist — Schreie, die noch lange unter den Bögen des Schiffs widerhallen.
languages.original_text: Having learned of the Rogue Trader's decision, Marazhai disappears in a fit of rage into the darkness of the ship's bowels. After several minutes, heart-rending screams can be heard from the gloom, belonging to the unfortunate soul who fell into the irate xenos's hands — screams which echo for a long time under the arches of the ship.

traits.locale_text: Nachdem Marazhai von der Entscheidung {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} erfährt, rauscht er zornig ab und verschwindet in der Dunkelheit des Schiffs. Nach mehreren Minuten sind aus der Düsternis herzzerreißende Schreie zu vernehmen, die Schreie der armen Seele, die dem zornigen Xenos in die Hände gefallen ist — Schreie, die noch lange unter den Bögen des Schiffs widerhallen.

languages.text: Quand il apprend la décision {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, Marazhai entre dans une colère noire avant de disparaître dans les entrailles du vaisseau. Quelques minutes plus tard, des hurlements déchirants se font entendre dans les ténèbres. Les cris d'agonie du pauvre bougre qui a eu le malheur de tomber entre les mains du xénos enragé résonnent encore longtemps sous les arches du vaisseau.
languages.original_text: Having learned of the Rogue Trader's decision, Marazhai disappears in a fit of rage into the darkness of the ship's bowels. After several minutes, heart-rending screams can be heard from the gloom, belonging to the unfortunate soul who fell into the irate xenos's hands — screams which echo for a long time under the arches of the ship.

traits.locale_text: Quand il apprend la décision {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, Marazhai entre dans une colère noire avant de disparaître dans les entrailles du vaisseau. Quelques minutes plus tard, des hurlements déchirants se font entendre dans les ténèbres. Les cris d'agonie du pauvre bougre qui a eu le malheur de tomber entre les mains du xénos enragé résonnent encore longtemps sous les arches du vaisseau.

languages.text: Hür Tacir'in kararını öğrenen Marazhai, öfkeyle geminin karanlığında kayboluyor. Birkaç dakika sonraysa öfkeli zenonun eline düşen talihsiz bir ruhun yürek parçalayan çığlıkları, karanlıktan yayılmaya başlayıp uzun bir süre gemide yankılanıyor.
languages.original_text: Having learned of the Rogue Trader's decision, Marazhai disappears in a fit of rage into the darkness of the ship's bowels. After several minutes, heart-rending screams can be heard from the gloom, belonging to the unfortunate soul who fell into the irate xenos's hands — screams which echo for a long time under the arches of the ship.
